import React from"react";import NavbarM from"../../../component/navbarMom/NavbarM";import Table from"@mui/material/Table";import TableBody from"@mui/material/TableBody";import TableCell from"@mui/material/TableCell";import TableContainer from"@mui/material/TableContainer";import TableHead from"@mui/material/TableHead";import TableRow from"@mui/material/TableRow";import Paper from"@mui/material/Paper";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getCellStyle=value=>{switch(value){case"متوسط":return{backgroundColor:"#FFFF99"};// Yellow
case"منخفض":return{backgroundColor:"#FF9999"};// Red
case"نقص":return{backgroundColor:"#FF9999"};// Red
case"طبيعي":return{backgroundColor:"#99FF99"};// Green
default:return{};}};const ComparisonChildPage=()=>{const rows=[{name:"الوزن",myChild:"10kg",normalChild:"12kg",score:"متوسط"},{name:"الطول",myChild:"75cm",normalChild:"80cm",score:"منخفض"},{name:"محيط الرأس",myChild:"45cm",normalChild:"47cm",score:"منخفض"},{name:"فيتامين أ + د",myChild:"نقص",normalChild:"طبيعي",score:"نقص"},{name:"فيتامين أ",myChild:"طبيعي",normalChild:"طبيعي",score:"طبيعي"},{name:"الحديد",myChild:"نقص",normalChild:"طبيعي",score:"نقص"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavbarM,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableContainer,{component:Paper,style:{margin:"100px auto",maxWidth:"800px",direction:"rtl"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHead,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",children:"\u0627\u0644\u0627\u0633\u0645"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",children:"\u0637\u0641\u0644\u064A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",children:"\u0627\u0644\u0637\u0641\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u0637\u0628\u064A\u0639\u064A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",children:"\u0627\u0644\u0639\u0644\u0627\u0645\u0629"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:rows.map((row,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",children:row.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",children:row.myChild}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",children:row.normalChild}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{align:"right",style:getCellStyle(row.score),children:row.score})]},index))})]})})]});};export default ComparisonChildPage;
